name: Nuclear Teapot
description:
Nuclear Teapot

You are a flying teapot and you have to brew explosive tea by pouring water into the cups. Drop teabags into full cups to launch tea missiles and destroy flying bagels. There are hungry mechanical jaws which will ruthlessly eat you in case you are not good at brewing tea.

How to play

- Swipe your finger over the screen to move.

- Find position to pour water or to drop a teabag into a cup.

- Press the left button to fill a cup with water.

- Press the right button to drop a teabag into a cup.

- A cup of tea will launch a tea missile.

- Try to launch tea missiles at flying bagels quickly.

- Hungry jaws will gradually move toward you.

- Destroy bagels in order to get rid of hungry jaws.

Features

- Free to play

- Challenging gameplay

- Unusual game mechanics

- Weird setting

- Endless gameplay

- Offline (without internet connection) gameplay supported

- Tablet devices are supported

- Easy game controls

Download Nuclear Teapot NOW and enjoy it on all android smart phones and android tablets for FREE. Please do not forget to leave your review about Nuclear Teapot.
